divs: Sighting Detailsflourescent glowing Orb flew across sky at around 10:30pm over interstate 10 in the area west of Blythe Ca.I was driving a truck eastbound at that time. It appeared to descend at a shallow .angle and then dissapeared without coming to ground. Must have been witnessed by many on interstate 10 at that time. I thought it may be a flare but it left no trail
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Blythe
There were no other sightings in Blythe on or around May 25th 2012
